maltcms.commands.distances
Class PairwiseDistance

java.lang.Object
  maltcms.commands.distances.PairwiseDistance
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfigurable
public class PairwiseDistance
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigurable

Class used to calculate a pairwise score or cost between mass-spectra. Objects of this class are used in ADynamicTimeWarp to calculate the distance/similiarity between scans, as configured.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de

This method can be called for precalculation of all distances/similarites. Values are set within the paramter ArrayDouble.D2 d and can be retrieved from it.
